column5: Last year I waited in line 3 hours at the Fort Francesborder crossing. I went through at noon on a Saturday. Has this improved this year?
We went thru Fort Francis on Friday, June 7 around 4:30 PM and had about a 10 minute wait. Very gracious, friendly, went well.
Waited over two hours at same crossing. Line was 2.4 miles longHope its better this year. Larry
About 15 years ago we were at the border for 5 hours. Of course we were all drunk and were trying to pick up the lovely Canadian customs lady....that may have had something to do with it...he he.
